title: UAE rolls out 3-year academic calendar for public and private schools: Key dates, mid-term breaks explained
summary_full: The Ministry of Education has unveiled a three-year academic calendar, spanning 2026-2029, providing fixed start dates, breaks, and end dates for public and private schools. This initiative aims to enhance stability, enabling families and educators to plan ahead. The calendar balances instructional time with learning outcomes, ensuring a structured educational journey for students.
